The only thing Wei Yi care about is finishing out. After shooting poorly all game, Allen Iverson made his last three shots and two clinching free throws that sent the series between the long-time rivals back to Boston for Game Five on Friday. projects." Mr Michael Gove will now look again at his decision with regard to these authorities with an open mind, taking representations from them, he said. Shadow education secretary Andy Burnham said: This ruling is a victory for all the communities and children betrayed by Michael Gove . "They deserve no less than a full apology from him today and a commitment to act quickly on the court's finding. "The ruling calls into question every school building scheme cut by Michael Gove and is a damning verdict on his competence as a Minister. He must tell us today how much public money he has spent trying to defend his botched and unfair decisions. The axe fell on projects involving more than 700 schools, provoking uproar from councils, unions and Labour politicians, who warned it would have a catastrophic effect on pupils. At the High Court

The Government is also looking again at vocational education, which plays a huge role in Tynedale and Mr Michael Gove was keen to acknowledge the role post-16 education plays in Tynedale. It is of vital importance to make sure people stay in education for longer, and in the Hexham constituency there are strong sixth forms, he said. a conference last month, said there "has been this nervousness, partly as a result of listening to political consultants... that you can't seem to be threatening voters" about voting for taxes. There's this worry about the optics of all that. I understand that- voters don't want to be threatened, and voters shouldn't be threatened, Bill Lockyer said. "However, you also have to be honest with them about what the consequences will be if the only policy option is an all-cut budget. And no one has yet produced that."
